{"id":1091074107,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1699076885,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1091074107/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Movement of Robots","memory":"N/A","code":"#define MOD 1000000007\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int sumDistance(vector<int>& positions, string s, int t) {\n        // After collision, the robots are simply swapping positions.\n        // Therefore, it is safe to assume that no collision occurs.\n        // We will advance each robot to its position at 't' seconds.\n        // After that we will simply calculate the total pair-wise sum of distances.\n        int n=s.length();\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {\n            if(s[i]=='L') positions[i]-=t;\n            else positions[i]+=t;\n        }\n        long long pairwise_dist=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++) {\n            for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++) {\n                pairwise_dist+=(abs(positions[i]-positions[j])%MOD);\n            }\n        }\n        return pairwise_dist%MOD;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"movement-of-robots","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
